entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as a person who is showing Harry the Beaux-batons carriage and the Durmst rang ship. He is also mentioned in conversation with Harry about Percy.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as a person who is intrigued by the Whom ping Willow and reminisces about the gamekeeper before Hagrid. She is also mentioned in conversation with Harry about Percy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is asking Bill and Mrs. Weasley questions and having conversations with them.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as a person who is upset and being questioned by the Ministry about Mr. Crouch's disappearance.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as a person whose disappearance is being kept quiet by the Ministry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as a gamekeeper before Ogg and also in general conversation.

entities.name: ogg
entities.description: Ogg is mentioned as the previous gamekeeper before Hagrid.

entities.name: whom ping willow
entities.description: The Whom ping Willow is a tree that has been planted after Mrs. Weasley left school and is mentioned as being intriguing to her.

relationships.description: Harry is having a conversation with Bill about Percy.
Harry is having a conversation with Mrs. Weasley about Percy.
Bill is concerned about Percy's well-being and mentions that he is not good.
Mrs. Weasley reminisces about the gamekeeper before Hagrid, who was Ogg.
Mr. Crouch's disappearance is being kept quiet by the Ministry.
